sentences.en: He came to see you of his own accord.
sentences.cn: 他自愿来看你.

sentences.en: He decided to go of his own accord.
sentences.cn: 他是自己决定要去的。

sentences.en: he would not seek treatment of his own accord.
sentences.cn: 他不会主动去求医的。

sentences.en: In many cases the disease will clear up of its own accord.
sentences.cn: 这种病很多情况下会自愈。

sentences.en: Most of my classmates accord in that opinion.
sentences.cn: 我们班大多数同学都是那个意见.

sentences.en: Most people are in accord with their desire for peace.
sentences.cn: 在渴望和平这一点上,大多数人都是一致的.

sentences.en: Of one accord, they went out of their room to enjoy the warmth of the sun.
sentences.cn: 他俩不约而同地走出房间去享受那温暖的阳光.

sentences.en: She mentioned it of her own accord.
sentences.cn: 她自动谈及此事.

sentences.en: The door seemed to move of its own accord.
sentences.cn: 那扇门似乎自己在动。

sentences.en: The hearts of our people accord with those of yours.
sentences.cn: 我们两国人民心心相印.

sentences.en: the Helsinki accord on human rights
sentences.cn: 赫尔辛基人权协定

sentences.en: The punishments accorded with the current code of discipline.
sentences.cn: 处罚与现行的纪律规则一致。

sentences.en: The reactionaries will never, of their own accord , step down from the stage of history.
sentences.cn: 反动派决不会自行退出历史舞台.

sentences.en: The two sides signed a peace accord last July.
sentences.cn: 在刚过去的七月，双方签订了和平条约。

sentences.en: There was a silence as the women turned with one accord to stare at Doreen.
sentences.cn: 那些女人一齐转身盯着多琳看，全场鸦雀无声。

sentences.en: These results are in accord with earlier research.
sentences.cn: 这些结果和先前的研究一致。

sentences.en: They came to an accord that profits should be shared equally.
sentences.cn: 他们达成协议,收益由大家均分.

sentences.en: They praised Tom with one accord.
sentences.cn: 他们异口同声地表扬汤姆.

sentences.en: We live in perfect accord with each other.
sentences.cn: 我们生活在一起十分融洽.

sentences.en: What he has just said does not accord with the views of the majority.
sentences.cn: 他刚才所说的同大多数人所持的观点不一致.

sentences.en: Why do you blame me? You'swallowed his bait " of your own accord.
sentences.cn: 你为什么怪我? 你是太公钓鱼,愿者上钩.

sentences.en: With one accord they turned and walked back over the grass.
sentences.cn: 他们步调一致地转身走过草坪。

sentences.en: You will not be accorded any special treatment.
sentences.cn: 你不会得到任何特殊待遇。

phrases.tran_cn: 自动地；自愿地；自然而然

trans.tran_en: a situation in which two people, ideas, or statements agree with each other
a situation in which two people, ideas, or statements agree with each other

trans.tran_cn: 给予（某种待遇），符合，与…一致
trans.tran_en: to give someone or something special attention or a particular type of treatment

trans.tran_cn: 使符合；使一致；调节；授予，赠与，给予
trans.tran_en: to give someone or something special attention or a particular type of treatment
